questions.question: LUIS enables rapid development of conversational AI applications without requiring deep knowledge of AI or machine learning.
Which of the following is NOT a best practice when developing a LUIS application?
options: Plan iteratively by mapping user scenarios early on
Automatically extract sensitive data irrespective of relevance
Use versioning to release newer iterations
Improve the model with real data
questions.answer: Automatically extract sensitive data irrespective of relevance

questions.question: What are the key components of a LUIS application and their roles in interpreting user input?
questions.answer: Utterances are user inputs, Intents represent tasks or actions, and Entities are specific pieces of information that refine the Intent.

questions.question: Describe how LUIS can be integrated with other Azure tools and provide one practical example.
questions.answer: LUIS integrates with tools like Azure Bot Framework, QnA Maker, and Speech Service. For example, it can be used with Azure Bot Framework to build a chatbot that interprets customer queries and recommends solutions.
